    def test_job_execution_with_all_parameters_and_recurrence(self, user_group_creation, job_execution_by, users_list):
        process_data = self.recurrence_obj.test_adding_all_parameters_and_publish_prototype_with_recurrence()

        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)

                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["image_capture"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["signature_param"], data=None)

        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["multi_line_param"], data={"value": "qwerty"})

    def execute_parameter(self, task_name, parameter_name, job_id=None, data=None, negative_testcase=False,
                          reason=None):
        if not job_id:
            job_id = const.JOB_ID
        audit_data_entry = []
        stage, task, param_details, stage_index, task_index = self.get_stage_task_parameter_details_for_execution(
            task_name, parameter_name,
            job_id)
        parameter_response_id = param_details["response"][0]["id"]
        payload_with_param_details = None
        if param_details["type"] in [parameter_types.SIGNATURE.value, parameter_types.MEDIA.value,
                                     parameter_types.FILE_UPLOAD.value]:
    
            if data and data["archive"]:
                media_data = copy.deepcopy(param_details["response"][0]["medias"][0])
                media_data["archived"] = True
                media_data["mediaId"] = media_data.pop("id")
                media_data["reason"] = "."
                param_details["data"]["medias"] = [media_data]
                payload_with_param_details = param_details
            else:
                payload_with_param_details = self.get_payload_for_image_signature(param_details)
    
            if param_details["type"] == parameter_types.SIGNATURE.value:
                audit_data_entry.append(
                    get_user_details_for_audit_logs() + "updated the signature for "f"parameter \"{parameter_name}\" in Task{stage_index}.{task_index} \"{task_name}\" of the stage \""f"{stage.stage_name}\"")
    
            elif (param_details["type"] == parameter_types.MEDIA.value or param_details[
                "type"] == parameter_types.FILE_UPLOAD.value) and data and data["archive"]:
                audit_data_entry.append(
                    get_user_details_for_audit_logs() + "archived file Name: "f"Image_capture (Description: Media for parameter execution) for parameter \"{parameter_name}\" in Task"f"{stage_index}.{task_index} \"{task_name}\" of the stage \"{stage.stage_name}\"")
            else:
                audit_data_entry.append(
                    get_user_details_for_audit_logs() + "uploaded file Name: "f"Image_capture (Description: Media for parameter execution) for parameter \"{parameter_name}\" in Task"f"{stage_index}.{task_index} \"{task_name}\" of the stage \"{stage.stage_name}\"")
    
        elif param_details["type"] in [parameter_types.SINGLE_LINE.value, parameter_types.MULTI_LINE.value,
                                       parameter_types.NUMBER.value, parameter_types.SHOULD_BE.value]:
            existing_data = param_details.get("data", {})
            existing_data['input'] = data["value"]
            param_details["data"] = existing_data
            payload_with_param_details = param_details
            value = data["value"]
            if param_details["type"] == parameter_types.SINGLE_LINE.value or param_details[
                "type"] == parameter_types.MULTI_LINE.value:
                audit_data_entry.append(
                    get_user_details_for_audit_logs() + f"updated text input to \"{value}\" for parameter \"{parameter_name}\" in Task{stage_index}.{task_index} \"{task_name}\" of the stage \"{stage.stage_name}\"")
    
            elif param_details["type"] == parameter_types.NUMBER.value:
                audit_data_entry.append(
                    get_user_details_for_audit_logs() + f"provided a value of \"{value}\" for \"{parameter_name}\" in Task{stage_index}.{task_index} \"{task_name}\" of the stage \"{stage.stage_name}\"")
    
            elif param_details["type"] == parameter_types.SHOULD_BE.value and not reason:
                audit_data_entry.append(
                    get_user_details_for_audit_logs() + f"provided \"{value}\" for \"{parameter_name}\" in Task{stage_index}.{task_index} \"{task_name}\" of the stage \"{stage.stage_name}\"")
    
            elif param_details["type"] == parameter_types.SHOULD_BE.value and reason:
                audit_data_entry.append(
                    get_user_details_for_audit_logs() + f"provided \"{value}\" for \"{parameter_name}\" stating reason \"{reason}\" in Task{stage_index}.{task_index} \"{task_name}\" of the stage \"{stage.stage_name}\"")
    
        elif param_details["type"] in [parameter_types.SINGLE_SELECT.value, parameter_types.MULTISELECT.value,
                                       parameter_types.YES_NO.value, "CHECKLIST"]:
            options = param_details["data"]
            update_options_data = []
            choices = param_details["response"][0]["choices"]
            for option in options:
                if option["name"] == data["value"] or option["name"] in data["value"]:
                    option["state"] = "SELECTED"
                elif choices and choices[option["id"]] == "SELECTED":
                    option["state"] = "SELECTED"
                else:
                    option["state"] = "NOT_SELECTED"
                update_options_data.append(option)
            if not update_options_data:

            param_details["data"] = update_options_data
